content: this legal text summarizes a court case in bari italy involving a dispute over donations and the division of community property the court dismissed the challenge to the donations and ordered the dissolution of the community property the estate was divided into two lots an apartment valued at €352000 and premises valued at €250000 the total value of the estate was €602000 with an ideal share of €301000 the second lot owed the first lot €51000 the court ruled that the donations were ineffective and ordered the division of the property the court also adjusted the valuation of the premises to €250000 the court concluded that the estate could be easily divided into two lots and ordered the division accordingly the court also addressed the expenses of the case the bari tribunal made a final ruling on the claim brought by da against ac va vf and vc the tribunal dismissed the challenge to the donations and ordered the dissolution of the community property the estate was divided into two lots an apartment valued at €352000 and premises valued at €250000 the total estate was worth €602000 with an ideal share of €301000 the second lot owed the first lot €51000 the shares will be drawn by lot unless the parties agree otherwise the case will continue per a separate order and the costs will be finalized this decision was made on september 17 2009
